abstract: The largest U.S. bank plans to rebrand itself once a deal to sell the logo to St. Paul Travelers closes in March.
snippet: The largest U.S. bank plans to rebrand itself once a deal to sell the logo to St. Paul Travelers closes in March.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup has decided to pack up its signature umbrella as it streamlines its corporate identity.

headline.main: Citigroup, Streamlining Its Brand, Will Sell Its Umbrella Logo to St. Paul
headline.print_headline: Citigroup, Streamlining Its Brand, Will Sell Its Umbrella Logo to St. Paul

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
